Extensions/Array.html.name: Array
Extensions/Array.html.abstract: Extends Array to support the Action Data controls and adds convenience methods for working with colors in a Codable, Encodable or Decodable class.

Extensions/Color.html.name: Color
Extensions/Color.html.abstract: Extends Color to support the Action Data controls and adds convenience methods for working with colors in a Codable, Encodable or Decodable class.

Extensions/String.html.name: String
Extensions/String.html.abstract: Extends String to support the Action Data controls and adds convenience methods for working with Image and Color properties in a Codable, Encodable or Decodable class.

Extensions/View.html.name: View
Extensions/View.html.abstract: Extends View to support the Action Data controls and adds convenience methods for working with Image properties in a Codable, Encodable or Decodable class.

Extensions/Data.html.name: Data
Extensions/Data.html.abstract: Extends Data to support the Action Data controls and adds convenience methods for working with data properties in a Codable, Encodable or Decodable class.

Extensions/Image.html.name: Image
Extensions/Image.html.abstract: Extends Image to support the Swiftlet Data controls and adds convenience methods for working with image properties in a Codable, Encodable or Decodable class.

Extensions/UIView.html.name: UIView
Extensions/UIView.html.abstract: Extends UIView to support the Action Data controls and adds convenience methods for working with Image properties in a Codable, Encodable or Decodable class.

Extensions/NSBitmapImageRep.html.name: NSBitmapImageRep
Extensions/NSBitmapImageRep.html.abstract: Extends NSBitmapImageRep to support the Action Data controls and adds convenience methods for working with image properties in a Codable, Encodable or Decodable class.

Extensions/NSImage.html.name: NSImage
Extensions/NSImage.html.abstract: Extends NSImage to support the Action Data controls and adds convenience methods for working with image properties in a Codable, Encodable or Decodable class.

Enums/AppleHardwareType.html#/s:17Swiftl.name: init(fromModel:)
Enums/AppleHardwareType.html#/s:17Swiftl.abstract: Takes a device model name in the form “iPhone10,3” and sets the enum to its human readable counterpart “iPhoneX”.

Enums/OperatingSystem.html#/s:17Swiftlet.name: macOS
Enums/OperatingSystem.html#/s:17Swiftlet.abstract: The app is running on a Mac.

Enums/OperatingSystem.html#/s:17Swiftlet.name: iOS
Enums/OperatingSystem.html#/s:17Swiftlet.abstract: The app is running on an iOS device.

Enums/OperatingSystem.html#/s:17Swiftlet.name: tvOS
Enums/OperatingSystem.html#/s:17Swiftlet.abstract: The app is running on an AppleTV.

Enums/OperatingSystem.html#/s:17Swiftlet.name: watchOS
Enums/OperatingSystem.html#/s:17Swiftlet.abstract: The app is running on an AppleWatch

Enums/OperatingSystem.html.name: OperatingSystem
Enums/OperatingSystem.html.abstract: Defines a list of available OS types that can be used with the SwitfUI extension .ifOSfunction.

Enums/AppleHardwareType.html.name: AppleHardwareType
Enums/AppleHardwareType.html.abstract: Used to convert an Apple device model name (in the form “iPhone10,3”) to a human readable form (such as “iPhoneX”). This enum works with the HardwareInformation class to get the type of device the app is running on.

Classes/Reachability.html#/s:17SwiftletU.name: shared
Classes/Reachability.html#/s:17SwiftletU.abstract: Holds a common shared instance of the Reachability class.

Classes/Reachability.html#/s:17SwiftletU.name: isConnectedToNetwork
Classes/Reachability.html#/s:17SwiftletU.abstract: Returns true if the device is connected to the network, else returns false.

Classes/Reachability.html#/s:17SwiftletU.name: isReachable
Classes/Reachability.html#/s:17SwiftletU.abstract: If true the internet is reachable, else it is not.

Classes/Reachability.html#/s:17SwiftletU.name: isExpensiveConnection
Classes/Reachability.html#/s:17SwiftletU.abstract: If true the current network connection is expensive to use, else it is not.

Classes/Reachability.html#/s:17SwiftletU.name: isConstrained
Classes/Reachability.html#/s:17SwiftletU.abstract: If true the current network connection uses an interface in Low Data Mode.

Classes/Reachability.html#/s:17SwiftletU.name: supportsIPv4
Classes/Reachability.html#/s:17SwiftletU.abstract: If true the current network connection supports IP version 4.

Classes/Reachability.html#/s:17SwiftletU.name: supportsIPv6
Classes/Reachability.html#/s:17SwiftletU.abstract: If true the current network connection supports IP version 6.

Classes/Reachability.html#/s:17SwiftletU.name: supportsDNS
Classes/Reachability.html#/s:17SwiftletU.abstract: If true the current network connection supports DNS lookup.

Classes/Reachability.html#/s:17SwiftletU.name: debugDescription
Classes/Reachability.html#/s:17SwiftletU.abstract: Returns a debugging description of the network path.

Classes/HTMLEntity.html#/s:17SwiftletUti.name: decode(_:)
Classes/HTMLEntity.html#/s:17SwiftletUti.abstract: Decodes the given string converting any HTML Entity codes into their resulting characters.

Classes/HardwareInformation.html#/s:17Sw.name: isPhone
Classes/HardwareInformation.html#/s:17Sw.abstract: Returns true if the app is running on an iPhone, else returns false.

Classes/HardwareInformation.html#/s:17Sw.name: isPad
Classes/HardwareInformation.html#/s:17Sw.abstract: Returns true if the app is running on an iPad, else returns false.

Classes/HardwareInformation.html#/s:17Sw.name: isTV
Classes/HardwareInformation.html#/s:17Sw.abstract: Returns true if the app is runnin on an Apple TV, else returns false.

Classes/HardwareInformation.html#/s:17Sw.name: isCar
Classes/HardwareInformation.html#/s:17Sw.abstract: Returns true if the app is running in Apple CarPlay, else returns false.

Classes/HardwareInformation.html#/s:17Sw.name: isWatch
Classes/HardwareInformation.html#/s:17Sw.abstract: Returns true if the app is running on an Apple Watch, else returns false.

Classes/HardwareInformation.html#/s:17Sw.name: isMac
Classes/HardwareInformation.html#/s:17Sw.abstract: Returns true if the app is running on an Mac, else returns false.

Classes/HardwareInformation.html#/s:17Sw.name: isMacCatalyst
Classes/HardwareInformation.html#/s:17Sw.abstract: Returns true if the app is running on an Mac via the Catalyst envrionment, else returns false.

Classes/HardwareInformation.html#/s:17Sw.name: modelName
Classes/HardwareInformation.html#/s:17Sw.abstract: Returns the model name of the device the app is running on. For example, iPhone10,3 or iPhone10,6 for the iPhone X.

Classes/HardwareInformation.html#/s:17Sw.name: deviceType
Classes/HardwareInformation.html#/s:17Sw.abstract: Returns the human readable type of the device that the app is running on (for example iPhoneX) or unknown if the type cannot be discovered.

Classes/HardwareInformation.html#/s:17Sw.name: osVersion
Classes/HardwareInformation.html#/s:17Sw.abstract: Returns the version number (for example iOS 11.1) of the OS installed on the device that the app is running on.

Classes/HardwareInformation.html.name: HardwareInformation
Classes/HardwareInformation.html.abstract: Defines a set of convenience properties and functions when working on Apple devices, such as checking the device model name (iPhone10,3), getting the device type (iPhoneX), getting the OS version, the current device orientation and internet connection state.

Classes/Reachability.html.name: Reachability
Classes/Reachability.html.abstract: Class used to monitor network connection and return the status.
